ctx: intros h st t n pli plt es ci st' e t' Hupdate Hin.
exceptions.tactic: destruct (handleAppendEntries h (snd st) t n pli plt es ci) as [st0 ps].
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface h : network st : name -> data t : list packet n : GhostSimulations.ghost_data pli : raft_data plt : list raft_output es : raft_data ci : list (name * msg) st' : name e : doGenericServer st' pli = (plt, es, ci) t' : cronies_term h Hupdate : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable h Hin : nwState h st' = (n, pli) The term "h" has type "network" while it is expected to have type "name".

original: intros h st t n pli plt es ci st' e t' Hupdate Hin. unfold update_elections_data_appendEntries in Hupdate. destruct (handleAppendEntries h (snd st) t n pli plt es ci) as [st0 ps]. injection Hupdate as Heq. rewrite <- Heq in Hin. auto.
